task.title: Set Up Connector
task.shortdesc: This is how you add the connector, in our case, Netlify, to use in your Publications and Deliverables to finally create your website.

step.cmd: Download a blank Github HTML repository to use in Netlify

substep.cmd: Go to this link to find a blank repository: VT-Evia/partystarter: This is a super basic HTML repository to get the party started with Netlify.
Once in this repository, click the green "Code" button.
Once it is downloaded, open the file and extract the files.

step.cmd: Go to Scale & Ship Faster with a Composable Web Architecture | Netlifyand Sign Up or Log in
Create a Netlify website using the blank HTML file from step 1

substep.cmd: Click the light blue "Add new site" button
At this page, drag your downloaded HTML file into the Netlify page.
This will create a randomly named blank website.

step.cmd: Locate your site ID for your Netlify site

substep.cmd: On the left side of the screen select "Site configuration"
Under the Site information window, you see a row labeled Site ID. This is very important for later.
